home.title: AnkiGenix - AI-Powered Smart Flashcard Generator
home.description: Transform your learning materials into high-quality Anki flashcards using AI technology. Support for text, PDF, web pages and more. Boost your learning efficiency significantly.
home.keywords: Anki, flashcards, AI learning, memory cards, study tool, smart generation, spaced repetition

features.title: Features - AnkiGenix
features.description: Discover AnkiGenix's powerful features: AI smart generation, multi-format support, one-click export, batch processing, and more for efficient learning.
features.keywords: Anki features, AI flashcard generation, PDF to Anki, batch generation, learning efficiency

dashboard.title: Dashboard - AnkiGenix
dashboard.description: Create and manage your Anki flashcards in the dashboard. Support for text, file, web and topic generation.
dashboard.keywords: Anki dashboard, create flashcards, manage learning materials

login.title: Login - AnkiGenix
login.description: Login to AnkiGenix and start your intelligent learning journey.

register.description: Create your AnkiGenix account and experience AI-powered flashcard generation for free.

hero.title: AI-Powered Flashcard Generation Tool
hero.subtitle: AnkiGenix uses AI technology to help you quickly convert learning materials into high-quality Anki flashcards, significantly improving learning efficiency

coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.subtitle: Four core features to comprehensively enhance your learning efficiency

aiGeneration.title: AI Smart Generation
aiGeneration.description: Use AI technology to automatically analyze learning materials and quickly generate structured Anki flashcards
details: Intelligently extract key knowledge points from text
Automatically generate Q&A format flashcard content
Support batch processing of large amounts of learning materials
Generate cards in Anki standard format

multiInput.title: Multiple Input Methods
multiInput.description: Flexible content input methods to adapt to different learning material sources
details: Upload PDF, Word and other document files
Enter web URL to automatically crawl content
Enter topic keywords for intelligent expansion

export.title: One-Click Export
export.description: Generated flashcards can be directly exported to Anki format for seamless learning workflow
details: Choose to export part or all cards
Compatible with Anki desktop and mobile

efficiency.title: Efficient and Convenient
efficiency.description: Significantly reduce manual card making time and let learning focus on memory and understanding
details: Complete dozens of flashcards in minutes
Real-time preview of generated card content

advancedFeatures.title: More Features
advancedFeatures.subtitle: Rich features to enhance learning experience

contentExtraction.title: Smart Content Extraction
contentExtraction.description: Accurately extract learning content from various documents

multiDiscipline.title: Multi-Discipline
multiDiscipline.description: Applicable to languages, history, science and other disciplines

taskManagement.title: Task Management
taskManagement.description: View historical generation records and manage learning materials

dataSecurity.title: Data Security

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Perfectly adapted to desktop and mobile browsers

batchEdit.title: Batch Editing
